1 #ifndef SF_MITTAG_LEFFLER_H
2 #define SF_MITTAG_LEFFLER_H 1
3 
4 #include <complex>
5 
6 #include <emsr/fp_type_util.h>
7 #include <emsr/detail/sf_mittag_leffler.tcc>
8 
9 namespace emsr
10 {
11 
12  /**
13  * Compute the Mittag-Leffer function:
14  * @f[
15  * E_{\alpha,\beta}(z)
16  * = \sum_{k=0}^\infty \frac{z^k}{\Gamma(\beta + \alpha k)},
17  * \mbox{ } \alpha > 0, \beta \in \mathbb{C}, z \in \mathbb{C}
18  * @f]
19  *
20  * @see COMPUTATION OF THE MITTAG-LEFFLER FUNCTION @f$ E_{\alpha,\beta}(z) @f$
21  * AND ITS DERIVATIVE, Rudolf Gorenflo, Joulia Loutchko & Yuri Luchko
22  */
23  template<typename Tp, typename Ta, typename Tb>
24  inline std::complex<emsr::fp_promote_t<Tp, Ta, Tb>>
25  mittag_leffler(Ta alpha, Tb beta, const std::complex<Tp>& z)
26  {
27  using type = emsr::fp_promote_t<Tp, Ta, Tb>;
28  return emsr::detail::mittag_leffler<type>(alpha, beta, z);
29  }
30 
31 } // namespace emsr
32 
33 #endif // SF_MITTAG_LEFFLER_H
